post.author: 황성규
post.content:
I just want u to consider the reason why some members did not write their private information.
In my case I'd be glad to but I couldn't. Why? I'm in Korea and I work for the company I can't reveal now.
Conclusionally, If u all support the policy leveraging members because of a regional fact ... I will follow ur decisions.
I will expect to be a formal member after immigration some day.
Thanks.
post.title: My opinion (Bran)
